betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Primary Use
Actually... they don’t serve much of a purpose—unless you’re actively hoping to summon an army of Wither skeletons to spawn relentlessly behind you.

Additional Notes
While technically edible, the plums are more of a liability than a resource due to their extreme side effects.
If you're looking for chaos or a challenging experience, keeping Corrupted Plums in your inventory might just provide it.
In short, these fruits are best avoided unless you’re feeling particularly masochistic or experimenting with Warp effects.
